articleContent:
Wuthering Waves Fan Creation Event "All Silent Souls Can Sing" has concluded, and we want to express our heartfelt appreciation to all participants for their dedication and creativity in our fan art event.
Let's view the winning entries and their contributors!

Artist: @neelamayu_n
